extendedInfo.description: Join Kermit, Animal, Miss Piggy, and the rest of the Muppets for the performance of a lifetime! Go on tour in this fun, musical game, brought to you by Disney and the creators of My Singing Monsters!The famous Muppet Theater stage is yours to manage; itâs up to you to reunite and recruit the all-star cast of Muppets, and put on the best show ever! Every Muppet that you recruit sings or plays a unique instrument in a larger musical number. Unlock them all to complete your very own Muppets Show in this all-new free mobile game!Features:â¢ Reunite the Muppets gang in this original game thatâs full of irresistible music, humor and familiar performers.â¢ Unlock and collect over 20 well-known Muppets including Kermit, Animal, Fozzie Bear, and many new Muppets as well!â¢ Complete different songs across unique stages like the Muppet Theater, Swedish Chefâs Kitchen, and more!â¢ Use Bunson & Beakerâs inventions to send Muppets on special missions to recruit star Muppets for your stage!â¢ Visit your friendsâ stages to rate their performances and collect special gifts!Get ready to hit the stage with your favorite Muppets!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Great game if you love the Muppets
reviews.comment: I love this game is very fun really useful and seen the Muppets again in this game is really good
reviews.author: Chris Blum

reviews.title: Cool Awesomatude!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: i love this game.its really fun and exciting........pls update it i really want the third stage....
reviews.author: Miguel Ramirez

reviews.title: Love the Muppets and love this.game!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and fun. Muppets are cool!
reviews.author: Annabel Bland

reviews.title: Adorable, fun, Muppetty goodness!
reviews.comment: It\'s fun and easy, the only one of this type of game I\'ve enjoyed, thank you Muppets!
reviews.author: Anne Emerson

reviews.title: A few characters refusing to digitize despite correct combo!
reviews.comment: Why do I keep having to redo combinations all the time OMG! I make them like it shows (it even shows the correct combination) after I hit the digitizer they are someone else WHY!!!
reviews.author: Matthew Snell

reviews.title: Needs updates!
reviews.comment: Bought backgrounds and lights with gems but game trying to recharge gems to switch back and forth! Roses appeared and disappeared on stage - lost?! Takes very long to receive more expensive Muppets in machine in kitchen stage with correct combos, received one now but uninstalled.
reviews.author: Ann Max

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Friend me 19726914KC & My mom 10967234AG I love it. Would love to see an additional stage after the kitchen. It would be cool to see different faces, Dr teeth, Janice, pepe etc. Have no complains. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Alise Marino

reviews.title: I enjoy that
reviews.comment: you can earn characters other ways than using diamonds that you would have to pay for or do offers for. I find the game amusing, but unfortunately it force closes quite a bit on my Samsung Galaxy S2. Now and then it also won\'t allow me to collect coins without closing out the game and reopening.
reviews.author: Korahkas Ka\'al

reviews.title: This game is awesome. I love the Muppets
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun. I love, love the Muppets
reviews.author: Carla Clark

reviews.title: Fantastic game
reviews.comment: I love this game.  I am almost level 18 and haven\'t spent any money.  I have all the characters for the Theater and almost all the ones for the Kitchen.  Can\'t wait for the third stage.  I highly recommend this game to everyone who loves The Muppets...so everyone.
reviews.author: Matthew Greenbaum

reviews.title: Love it but....
reviews.comment: Having a hard time digitizing Kermit, Miss Piggy, and Fozzie, can someone tell me the correct combo please? Thanks!!
reviews.author: Chris Cirullo

reviews.title: Thank you!!
reviews.comment: Finally got it together! Glad you fixed the issue fast bcuz it was close to deletion! I love this game!
reviews.author: Mahogany Boyd

reviews.title: More ways....
reviews.comment: Wish there were more ways to earn diamonds...or maybe exchange coins for diamonds? Also, every time I digitize a muppet its been the same result even though I try different combinations or consistently try the same mix of muppets for a different result...would rate it 5 if these were fixed.
reviews.author: Maija Rampanen

reviews.title: Harvey doesnt work
reviews.comment: I use the combination to bring on muppets anf it.keeps bringing on muppets I already have. Really pissimg me off.  Takes all the fun out if an otherwise cool game.  So therefire I give it 3 stars instead of 5.
reviews.author: caithlin dar

reviews.title: Fun and Creative
reviews.comment: This app really allows the user to make their own Muppet band/show. Leveling up and upgrading is easy and simple to manage. Highly recommended for your little ones as well as any Muppet fan!
reviews.author: Randy Ryan

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your
reviews.comment: This game sucks. I played for 3 weeks . Maybe good for a 5 year old. Uninstall.
reviews.author: Phil Koprowski

reviews.title: Screen goes black and doest start
reviews.comment: The screen goes black can\'t get it to work I\'ve been on level 14 I\'m so mad right now...... Does anyone know how to fix this... I don\'t want to lose everthing...
reviews.author: Matthew Fultz

reviews.title: Needs reprogramming
reviews.comment: The usage of the machine to produce thw characters does not work all the time, it keeps giving me different characters with same formula. Ive been trying to get fozzy, and still no success. And when you order food, it doesnt produce any items ssometimes..ugh..very frustrated indeed
reviews.author: Melodie B

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Please fix. It was working fine. And now it won\'t open it just goes to a black screen. And force closes. I have a Kyocera hydro. When fixed I\'ll give 5 stars if not fixed soon I will delete.
reviews.author: Robert Morgan

reviews.title: Building a Muppet band
reviews.comment: Great time killer for all ages! (Muppets) what else can say?  Awesome!!!
reviews.author: Eric Sherfield
